declare @round int, @he_so numeric(19, 5), @ten_dh nvarchar(128), @ten_dh2 nvarchar(128), @ma_nguon char(2), @d smalldatetime, @$sl_nhap numeric(19, 4), @$sl_dh numeric(19, 4), @$sl_da_yc numeric(19, 4) select @round = cast(val as int) from options where name = 'm_round_sl' select @he_so = he_so from dmqddvt where ma_vt = @ma_vt and dvt = @dvt if (@he_so is null or @he_so = 0) select @he_so = 1 select @ma_nguon = case when @xac_nhan = '1' then 'FP' else 'PL' end, @d = dbo.mf_GetNetBackwardDate(@ngay_ct, @tg_th), @$sl_nhap = round(@sl_nhap * @he_so, @round), @$sl_dh = round(@sl_dh * @he_so, @round), @$sl_da_yc = round(@sl_da_yc * @he_so, @round)
select @ten_dh = case when @@language = 'v' then rtrim(ten_nguon) else rtrim(ten_nguon2) end from mrdmnguon where ma_nguon = @ma_nguon select @ten_dh2 = case when @@language = 'v' then rtrim(ten_nguon) else rtrim(ten_nguon2) end from mrdmnguon where ma_nguon = 'PR'
update mpctyc set xac_nhan = @xac_nhan, nguon = @ma_nguon, sl_dh = @$sl_dh, sl_nhap = @$sl_nhap, ngay_ct = @ngay_ct, ngay_dat = @d, user_id2 = @@userID, datetime2 = getdate() where stt_rec = @stt_rec select '' as field, '' as message, 'on$Filter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(this,''' + isnull(rtrim(replace(replace(@ten_dh, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''')), '') + ''',''' + isnull(rtrim(replace(replace(@ten_dh2, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''')), '') + ''',''' + @ma_nguon + ''', ' + rtrim(@$sl_dh) + ',' + rtrim(@$sl_nhap) + ',' + rtrim(@$sl_da_yc) + ',''' + convert(char(8), @ngay_ct, 112) + ''',''' + convert(char(8), @d, 112) + ''');' as script return
